transArray.content: The room is in a good location, very clean, hygienic and reassuring, and the service is very good

Hello dear guest! Thank you for your comprehensive review and recognition of Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. Your encouragement is very important. If life is a journey, we would like to be your warmest site. If meeting is a ballad, we would like to be your ray of happiness. Notes, I want you to write your feelings in notes. All the hotel friends look forward to meeting you next time at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. I wish you all the best! Manager: Ren Yuanyuan
